author: MaximoTrinidad
body:
<!--

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------
Click on the Windows 10 PowerShell MSI link on the main GitHub PowerShell page

Expected behavior
-----------------
Download Windows 10 MSI

Actual behavior
---------------
MSI not found

Environment data
----------------

Windows 10 client

![downloaderr_2017-04-07_9-35-09](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/19892435/24802488/3755c6d2-1b76-11e7-8084-6d515760b75c.jpg)

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Hi @chuanjiao10,

Nope! No luck. I'm still getting the 404 link error.  Of course I'm able to go to the "release" page but anyone could have issues with the link.

:)

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
All other links also defaced.
But I can load from release page https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
I believe it is GitHub cache problem.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: I'm closing this issue since the links are functioning now

title: Download Error 404 - Windows 10 PowerShell.0.0-alpha18 MSI not found
